messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Positivity, considerations, a new sound file
messages.msgSnippet: -=-Is the link meant to be in the email, Sandra?-=- That would have been SUCH a good idea!  Thank you.  Yes!  Here (I hope) it is…
messages.messageBody:
-=-Is the link meant to be in the email, Sandra?-=-

That would have been SUCH a good idea! Thank you. Yes! Here (I hope) it is…

http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2017/01/happier-and-more-postive-considerations.html

I had it cut and copied in my hand but failed to paste. So weird, to be able to carry a thing around like that, ghostlike. I love when I have cut to paste and then get up and go do something, and when I come back to the computer, it’s still ready to paste. :-) And that’s not a new thing. That’s over 25 years old, I think. :-)

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Positivity, considerations, a new sound file
messages.msgSnippet: Is the link meant to be in the email, Sandra? On Sun, Jan 1, 2017 at 8:51 PM, Sandra Dodd Sandra@SandraDodd.com ... Is the link meant to be in the email,
messages.messageBody:
Is the link meant to be in the email, Sandra?

On Sun, Jan 1, 2017 at 8:51 PM, Sandra Dodd Sandra@... [AlwaysLearning] <AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
 

New on my site. Go to this link where there are three new things and a beautiful photo (by Lisa Jonick) that links to something else good.

If you’re not already subscribed to site news, it might be worth doing. There’s only about a post or two a month. And at that blog, your sure to find things you’ve never seen before by clicking “random” or “you might also like…”

Sandra

messages.messageBody:
New on my site. Go to this link where there are three new things and a beautiful photo (by Lisa Jonick) that links to something else good.

If you’re not already subscribed to site news, it might be worth doing. There’s only about a post or two a month. And at that blog, your sure to find things you’ve never seen before by clicking “random” or “you might also like…”

Sandra
